defaultData.title: Virtual Community Partner Spotlight
defaultData.description: In collaboration with Kapiolani Community College's Service & Sustainability Learning Program, we are excited to present to you the October Virtual Community Partner Spotlight!

defaultData.title: EXPLORE MĀNOA
defaultData.description: This FREE event is hosted by the University of Hawaii at Mānoa Office of Admissions.

defaultData.title: Interstellar Cinderella
defaultData.description: Based on the children’s book by Deborah Underwood, Cinderella is a space engineer looking to revolutionize space travel with her new invention.

defaultData.title: HALEIWA MARKET
defaultData.location:
Waimea Valley

59-864 Kamehameha Highway Haleiwa 96712 United States of America
defaultData.description: Every Thursday starting at 2 pm shop and support local farmers and artisans at the Haleiwa Market located at the Pikake Pavilion in Waimea Valley.
